channel.title: Looking for client forums graphics deve and beta testers
channel.description:
[center][b][size=12pt]When your application are accepted I'm going to need 100% from you guys this means you guys have to be dedicated.
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/o5qcro.jpg[/img]
Client developer - 0/2 Forums developer - 0/2 Graphic designers - 0/2 Beta testers - 0/3
Legend: [color=green]Accepted[/color] [color=red]Denied[/color]
If you would to apply for any of those above roles that are currently open please use this format:[/size][/b] [code]Name: Time zone: Role applying for: Are you experienced in this role: Previous work:[/code][/center]

@irushyoux3 wrote:

Name:phil
Time zone:GMT +0
Role applying for:beta tester ( i can code and host)
Are you experienced in this role: yes i have been a beta tester on many server’s including pvp corruption and quarterx
Previous work:had my own server

also my msn is phil-94@live.co.uk

p.s you spelt graphics wrong in the development team area you spelt it as grahpic
